response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it would be an asset to you. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our commitment to ensuring you receive the best possible value. We trust that you will find this proposal favorable and look forward to discussing the details further. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product.", "product_price": 950000}
